name: bookhaven
tagline: A self-hosted eBook library for organizing and tracking reading activity
description: BookHaven is a self-hosted eBook library designed to organize and manage digital books. It offers an intuitive web interface for browsing, filtering, and tracking reading progress and integrates with OPDS readers.

features.title: Personal Library Management
features.description: Organizes and tracks personal book collections

features.description: Records current reading status and history

features.description: Stores author, genre, and publication details

features.title: Search and Filtering
features.description: Finds books by title, author, or category

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manages the library through a browser

features.title: Self-Hosted Storage
features.description: Keeps library data under user control
